participant_1.background:
My mother raised me by herself while working two jobs.
Spiders scare the life out of me.
I pray to god for my family every morning.
I always put my left sock on first.

participant_2.background:
I own my own music store.
My mother and father are both in the church choir.
I am an animal rights activist.
I hope to retire to florida.

content.text: Hi, I'm [name]!
Hi, I'm [name]! It's nice to meet you!
It's nice to meet you too! What do you do for a living?
I own my own music store.
That's so cool! What kind of music do you sell?
We have a wide variety of music, from classical to rock to country.
That's awesome! I'm sure you've seen a lot of interesting things in your time working at a music store.
I have, actually! One time, I had a customer who came in and asked for a record of something that was never recorded.
That's crazy! What did you do?
Well, I told him that we didn't have it, but he was so insistent that I went to the back room and looked anyway.
And? Did you find it?
No, I didn't, but it was fun trying!
That's really funny! I bet that customer was really disappointed.
He was, but he was also really nice. He told me that he was a big fan of the band and that he had always wanted to hear their music on vinyl.
That's so sweet! I'm glad you were able to make his day.
Me too! It's always nice to make a customer happy.
So, what are some of your other hobbies?
I'm an animal rights activist. I'm really passionate about protecting animals and making sure they have a good life.
That's awesome! I'm a big animal lover too. I've always thought it's important to treat animals with respect.
Me too! I think it's important to remember that animals are sentient beings and deserve to be treated as such.
I agree completely! What kind of work do you do for animal rights?
I volunteer at a local animal shelter and I also donate to animal welfare organizations.
That's great! I'm sure your work is making a difference in the lives of animals.
I hope so! I'm just glad I can do something to help.
I'm sure you are making a difference! You're an amazing person!
Thank you! That means a lot to me.
It's true! You're doing great things for animals.
I'm just trying to do my part
